description: Surrogate primary key for this asset–procedure linkage; uniquely identifies the row.
Identifier of the asset the procedure applies to; foreign key to the asset master.
Identifier of the maintenance or inspection procedure assigned to the asset; references the procedure catalog.
System-generated timestamp when this asset–procedure association was last updated by any process.
Likely references the related work order or work-order–procedure instance for this asset; confirm with SME.
Timestamp for the last user-driven change to this record; may duplicate last_modified; confirm with SME.
User ID that created this asset–procedure association.
Timestamp when this asset–procedure association was created.
User ID that most recently modified this asset–procedure association.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to this asset–procedure association.
